sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './User.css' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { followUser } from '../../actions/userAction' const User = ({ person }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.authReducer.authData) const serverPublic = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER const handleFollow = () => { dispatch(followUser(person._id, user)) } return (
{person.firstname} @{person.username}
) } export default User
